Yarr! It be international talk like a Pirate day! Well me harties y’vall lived like lubbers all ye lives, now try the pirate way! Avast! The fine fellows at Talk Like a Pirate have put together a video on how to speak like a scurvy dog pirate to get you started. Most notably tho, Flickr has gone all out in support by adding a new language option for the occasion, so go and check it out quick before yarrrr miss it!
